Regulation Name(s): Factor V Leiden DNA Mutation Detection Systems
Specimen Type(s): Genomic DNA isolated from whole blood
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Thermal cycler (ABI GeneAmp PCR System 9700, ABI Veriti, MJ Research PTC-100)
Fluorometer (Tecan Infinite, Tecan Genios, BioTek FLx800)
PC running Invader Factor V software
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Invader Factor V qualitative genotyping test detecting Factor V Leiden G1691A mutation using Invader Plus chemistry and FRET on isolated genomic DNA
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic test for detection and genotyping of the G to A mutation at position 1691 of the human Factor V gene in genomic DNA isolated from whole blood potassium EDTA samples from patients with suspected thrombophilia
